document_data.mainbody:
Mellor Rhagust was a weaver inhabiting Waterdeep, the City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Mellor was the public spokesperson for the Most Excellent Order of Weavers and Dyers circa 1357 DR. He worked out of the House of Textiles, which was their headquarters on Nethpranters Street in the Trades Ward.
